actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To provide for the disposition of land deemed excess to a project for flood control at Matewan, West Virginia.
short_title: Matewan Flood Control Excess Project Land Disposal Act of 1999

summary.text: Matewan Flood Control Excess Project Land Disposal Act of 1999 - Directs the United States to convey to the Town of Matewan, West Virginia, four specified parcels of land deemed excess by the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, to the structural project for flood control constructed by the Corps along the Tug Fork River.

titles.title: Matewan Flood Control Excess Project Land Disposal Act of 1999
To provide for the disposition of land deemed excess to a project for flood control at Matewan, West Virginia.
